sentences: Hey Matteo, como estas? Pretty lovely day we're having ayy litttle man?
Right! It's a perfect day to watch all the little pajaros flying around making their little cheeps.
Oh, pues I guess you're right. It cound be better. At least here aren't no abejas flying around. Those things freak me out.
Anyways, I'm guessing you're here for your abuelita's candles. I got them but could you help me a little before grab them?
Gracias Matteo! Okay so I need to take my abuelita to the doctors but she isn't opening the door. She usually take a nap around this time but it take FOREVER to wake her up.
Could you kick the ball at her door at the end of street? I woke her up once like that pero she told me if I did that again she'd get la chancla.
I'm sure you'll be okay tho.
Oh. Okay... Let me know when you've got time then. I guess I'll just keep the candles for a little longer.
Hey little man, don't forget to wake up my Abuelita. She's as the end of the street with the (ADD COLOR HERE) door
Just don't kick it too hard. You might scare the little pajaros away.
Oh wow, I heard her from here! Thanks Matteo. If she gets angry or anything I'll the the blame. No precupes.
Here's the candles little man. Again gracias por todo.
They're for your abuelito Oscar no? I remember him. He was a cool guy. Siempre mire when he was painting the town and everything
Acuerdo one time where he saw one of the pictures I took of a pajaro and he really liked it. Dijo que I should keep it up. Even said I can do it for a living. That was nice to hear. Maybe I will...
No yeah gracias again Matteo. Have a good one.
Thanks again Matteo. If you see any cool birds around digame.
